about_product_text_c_113497562.text: Whether you want to finance a medical emergency, take a much-needed family vacation, or give your home a long-awaited makeover, a personal loan allows you to tackle your urgent financial needs with utmost ease.

about_product_text_c_1596614030.text: At Tata capital, we strive to ease your financial worries with our range of multipurpose personal loans online. Get affordable and unsecured personal finance of up to Rs. 35 lakhs at attractive interest rates. The best part? We have made the loan process extremely convenient for you with our digital application process and easy-to-meet eligibility criteria.

about_product_text_c.text: Besides, we offer a flexible personal loan tenure of up to 6 years, making your loan repayment much more affordable on your pocket. Get ready to experience a hassle-free loan process like never before – enjoy fast loan processing and customised instant personal loan offerings depending on your diverse financial needs.

instant-personal-slider.className: instant-personal-slider multipurpose-slider flex-slider slider-arrows jsMultiPurposeSlider slick-slider

key_features_card.jcr:description: No matter what the occasion is, we have the right Personal Loan offering for you. Be it for weddings, higher studies, travel or any other purpose.
key_features_card.jcr:title: Multipurpose Personal Loan

key_features_card_co.jcr:description: We don’t ask for any collateral or security for Personal Loans.
key_features_card_co.jcr:title: No collateral /security

key_features_card_co_794060650.jcr:description: Need extra money? We let you withdraw additional funds above your personal loan up to an agreed limit. Interest is charged only on the amount you use.
key_features_card_co_794060650.jcr:title: Overdraft facility

key_features_card_co_2030809829.jcr:description: You can pre pay part of the instant personal loan any time after 6 months of availing a Personal Loan without any penalty or additional fee.
key_features_card_co_2030809829.jcr:title: Zero charges on part pre-payment

component_title.boldTerm: Avail TATA Capital loans directly from WhatsApp

text.text: A Personal Loan helps you address various personal finance needs conveniently. Major expenses often come up without warning, so don’t let them drain all your savings. Here are some common scenarios where you can take Personal Loans:

instant-personal-slider.className: instant-personal-slider multipurpose-slider flex-slider slider-arrows jsCanTakeSlider slick-slider

key_features_card.jcr:description: Struggling to arrange the down payment for the property you want to buy? With a Personal Loan online from Tata Capital, book your dream house without any difficulty. Get the required funds within minutes of approval and at competitive rates.
key_features_card.jcr:title: Make a Down Payment

key_features_card_co_1482979723.jcr:description: Is keeping track of multiple personal loan instalments becoming a challenge? Manage your finances better by consolidating your existing personal loans into one and clear dues comfortably. Avail of a quick and easy Personal Loan from Tata Capital and reduce your EMI burden considerably.
key_features_card_co_1482979723.jcr:title: Debt consolidation

key_features_card_757314299.jcr:description: Is keeping track of multiple personal loan instalments becoming a challenge? Manage your finances better by consolidating your existing personal loans into one and clear dues comfortably. Avail of a quick and easy Personal Loan from Tata Capital and reduce your EMI burden considerably.
key_features_card_757314299.jcr:title: Debt consolidation

right-box-container.jcr:title: Instant & paperless Personal Loan of upto ₹1,00,000

heading.jcr:title: Loans should be instant, and the

description.text: Get the best loan deals with our pre-approved offers

text.text: Tata Capital provides unique and flexible Personal Loans for salaried individuals. Now that you know what is a personal loan, the following can get a Personal Loan from Tata Capital:

If you’re a student looking for a way to finance higher education or make a big-ticket purchase, get a co-signer and avail of a Personal Loan online.

Instant approval and speedy disbursals are guaranteed perks when applying at Tata Capital.

Instant approval and speedy disbursals are guaranteed perks when applying at Tata Capital.

about_product_text_c_113497562.text: Whether you want to finance a medical emergency, take a much-needed family vacation, or give your home a long-awaited makeover, a personal loan allows you to tackle your urgent financial needs with utmost ease.

about_product_text_c_1596614030.text: At Tata capital, we strive to ease your financial worries with our range of multipurpose personal loans online. Get affordable and unsecured personal finance of up to Rs. 35 lakhs at attractive interest rates. The best part? We have made the loan process extremely convenient for you with our digital application process and easy-to-meet eligibility criteria.

about_product_text_c.text: Besides, we offer a flexible personal loan tenure of up to 6 years, making your loan repayment much more affordable on your pocket. Get ready to experience a hassle-free loan process like never before – enjoy fast loan processing and customised instant personal loan offerings depending on your diverse financial needs.

description.text: Applicant’s personal loan eligibility depends on various factors, including a fixed monthly income, age, nature of employment, CIBIL score, professional experience, etc. For a quick Personal Loan from Tata Capital, you must fulfil the easy-to-meet eligibility criteria.

component_title_copy.jcr:title: What is the importance of CIBIL score for

about_product_text.text: CIBIL score, an important indicator of your credit health, is a three-digit number summarising your credit history, report, and rating. The score ranges from 300 to 900 and indicates your ability to repay your personal loan amount in a timely manner.

about_product_text_c.text: CIBIL score, an important indicator of your credit health, is a three-digit number summarising your credit history, report, and rating. The score ranges from 300 to 900 and indicates your ability to repay your personal loan amount in a timely manner.

about_product_text_c_1819265733.text: CIBIL score, an important indicator of your credit health, is a three-digit number summarising your credit history, report, and rating. The score ranges from 300 to 900 and indicates your ability to repay your personal loan amount in a timely manner.

heading.jcr:title: What is the importance of CIBIL score for

component_title_copy.jcr:title: How much CIBIL score is required for a

about_product_text.text: A CIBIL score is a numerical summary of your repayment capacity. It is a 3-digit number, ranging between 300 to 900, which provides a snapshot of your past track record. As a result, the score is used to assess your creditworthiness and decide the terms of the loan.

about_product_text_c.text: CIBIL score, an important indicator of your credit health, is a three-digit number summarising your credit history, report, and rating. The score ranges from 300 to 900 and indicates your ability to repay your personal loan amount in a timely manner.

about_product_text_c_1819265733.text: CIBIL score, an important indicator of your credit health, is a three-digit number summarising your credit history, report, and rating. The score ranges from 300 to 900 and indicates your ability to repay your personal loan amount in a timely manner.

heading.jcr:title: How much CIBIL score is required for a

text.text:
When you receive a pre-approved offer for a Personal Loan, it simply means that the lender has evaluated your creditworthiness and agreed to advance a loan. So, you don't need to go through the initial stages of the application process and receive a guaranteed loan in the least time possible. So the overall loan processing time becomes shorter.

 

Generally, borrowers who have a spotless history of paying credit dues are eligible for instant pre-approved loans. However, other criteria like monthly income, credit score, age, etc., also play a decisive role.
Got a high CIBIL score and a spotless credit history? Get a pre-approved Personal Loan from Tata Capital online.

about_product_text_c.text: Whether you want to finance a medical emergency, take a much-needed family vacation, or give your home a long-awaited makeover, a personal loan allows you to tackle your urgent financial needs with utmost ease.

about_product_text.text: The standard EMI option under Personal Loans is one in which you get the freedom to pay off your principal loan amount inclusive of interest consistently on a monthly basis.

about_product_text_73248479.text: Here, the interest is charged on the total principal amount that was borrowed.

why_to_choose_us_rea.jcr:description: With the customers’ individual desires and needs in mind, our team at Tata Capital guides you at every step and offers specific financial solutions.
why_to_choose_us_rea.jcr:title: Tata Capital, a name you can trust

why_to_choose_us_rea_2070261468.jcr:description: Our Personal Loan interest rates are competitive and affordable. We let you tailor everythingaccording to your convenience and ability to repay.
why_to_choose_us_rea_2070261468.jcr:title: We offer attractive interest rates

why_to_choose_us_rea_458072273.jcr:description: Our Personal Loan lets you choose the loan amount, tenure and EMI period for which you need the loan.
why_to_choose_us_rea_458072273.jcr:title: We’re Flexible

why_to_choose_us_rea_499391721.jcr:description: We only ask for minimal documentation to process your application. We just need some mandatory information like the source of your income and the purpose of the loan.
why_to_choose_us_rea_499391721.jcr:title: We’re not going to bother you about collateral

why_to_choose_us_rea_1708358173.jcr:description: Our personalised approach gives us the edge and has left countless of our customers satisfied. You are not just an application form to us. We understand that one size doesn’t fit all.
why_to_choose_us_rea_1708358173.jcr:title: We offer tailor-made loans

why_to_choose_us_rea_121792436.jcr:description: This means we understand your needs and we will tailor our services to your needs. If you look good, we look good.
why_to_choose_us_rea_121792436.jcr:title: We’ve been in the industry for a long time

text.text: With the customers’ individual desires and needs in mind, our team at Tata Capital guides you at every step and offers specific financial solutions.

Need to manage immediate expenses in the Garden city of India? Take an instant Loan

item_1671182759452.cq:panelTitle: Who can avail a Personal Loan?

text.text: Personal loan can be availed by those who meet the following eligibility criteria:

popular_faq_descript_200750825.jcr:title: Monthly Income–must be at least Rs. 15,000 per month.

popular_faq_descript_1717367127.jcr:title: Job Stability–The applicant must be in the same job for the past six months.

popular_faq_descript_1283418988.jcr:title: Work Experience–The applicant must have a minimum of one year of work experience.

item_1671182794032.cq:panelTitle: What are the documents required for Personal Loan?

text.text: The documents needed to avail of a personal loan depend on the purpose of your loan. For example,

item_1671182842904.cq:panelTitle: What are the documents needed for Personal Loan for self-employed?

text.text: The following are documents required for personal loan eligibility by self-employed individuals –

popular_faq_descript.jcr:title: Proof of Existence of Business–Tax Registration copy/Company Registration License/Shop Establishment Proof

popular_faq_descript_2140895260.jcr:title: Identity Proof documents–Passport/Voter’s ID/PAN Card/Driving Licens

popular_faq_descript_238767962.jcr:title: Residence Proof documents–Passport/Aadhar Card/Utility Bill/Ration Card

popular_faq_descript_1398810579.jcr:title: Bank Account Statements–Savings and Current account statements for the past one year

popular_faq_descript_48870029.jcr:title: Income Tax Returns filed for the preceding year

item_1671182856999.cq:panelTitle: How can a self-employed person get a Personal Loan?

text.text: A self-employed person can get a personal loan with Tata Capital by meeting the following eligibility criteria –

popular_faq_descript.jcr:title: The applicant’s age must be between 22 to 58 years

popular_faq_descript_1530875188.jcr:title: The applicant must have a monthly income of at least Rs.15,000

popular_faq_descript_211221741.jcr:title: The applicant must have at least one year of work experience

item_1671182872895.cq:panelTitle: What is the minimum salary required for availing of a Personal Loan?

text_copy.text: The minimum salary requirement for availing of a personal loan with Tata Capital is Rs. 15,000.

item_1671182885681.cq:panelTitle: What document proofs do you need for availing of a Personal Loan?

text_copy.text: The following are the basic personal loan documents you need for availing of a loan:

popular_faq_descript.jcr:title: Photo Identity Proof–Copy of your Voter’s ID/Passport/Driving License/Aadhar Card

popular_faq_descript_1706122490.jcr:title: Income Proof–Copy of past six months’ bank statements

popular_faq_descript_505670141.jcr:title: Address Proof–Copy of your Ration Card/Electricity Bill/Passport

popular_faq_descript_608524888.jcr:title: Salary Slips–Copy of your past three months’ salary slips

popular_faq_descript_787458372.jcr:title: Employment Certificate–stating one year of continuous employment

item_1671182897102.cq:panelTitle: What are the documents needed for Education Loan?

text.text: Here is the education loan documents list you need to produce:

popular_faq_descript.jcr:title: Photo Identity Proof–Copy of your Voter’s ID/Passport/Driving License/Aadhar Card

popular_faq_descript_75967621.jcr:title: Attested copies of Marks Sheets & Certificates (from 10th standard)

popular_faq_descript_353253628.jcr:title: Admission letter issued by the admitting School / College / Institute

popular_faq_descript_2077397427.jcr:title: Last three months' salary slips & ITR of Parent/Guarantor

popular_faq_descript_50884970.jcr:title: Education loan documents for studying abroad

popular_faq_descript_1502844890.jcr:title: Other supporting documents required for student loan

popular_faq_descript_232017893.jcr:title: Student loan documents regarding employment details (if employed)

item_1671123079130.jcr:description:
Want to fund your vacation but falling short on funds? An EMI based loan can be an ideal way to pay for a holiday that you can’t quite cover in one go.

Tata Capital Personal Loan for Travel is how you can make it happen. Head off on your next adventure.
